item.endersteel.ender_steel_core.tooltip: §7A powerful core infused with ender energy
item.endersteel.ender_steel_rod.tooltip: §7A reinforced rod infused with ender steel
item.endersteel.void_mace.tooltip: §5A powerful mace that can be enhanced with ender energy
item.endersteel.armor.teleport_ability: Dodge up to 5 hits (2 minute cooldown)
item.endersteel.sword.store_instruction: Right-click with Ender Pearl to store
item.endersteel.sword.teleport_chance: Chance to teleport and damage enemies on hit
item.endersteel.sword.enders_edge: Ender's Edge: Teleports enemies within 5 blocks
enchantment.endersteel.gazing_void.desc: Right-click to activate. Next hit blinds and immobilizes target
enchantment.endersteel.void_strike.desc: 50% chance to teleport hit enemies within a 5-block radius
enchantment.endersteel.phantom_harvest.d: Killing enemies recharges evasion charges when wearing full armor set, or heals 1 heart
enchantment.endersteel.rift_cleave.desc: Sweeping attacks hit all enemies within 5 blocks, with a chance to pull them toward you
When hit, repulse all nearby entities and reflect half the damage back to the attacker
enchantment.endersteel.gravitide.desc: Pulls enemies toward you on hit and on kill
effect.endersteel.gazing_void.descriptio: Your vision is revoked by the void
advancement.endersteel.root.desc: Obtain your first piece of Ender Scrap
advancement.endersteel.get_full_armor.de: Obtain a complete set of Ender Steel armor
advancement.endersteel.phantom_harvest.d: Gain a teleport charge on kill, or heal 1 heart without full set
advancement.endersteel.staring_contest.d: Make an Ender Steel Block fully open its eye
advancement.endersteel.rift_step.desc: Dodge an attack using the Ender Steel Armor's full set ability
advancement.endersteel.endermite_bane.de: Defeat an Endermite using an Ender Steel weapon
advancement.endersteel.obtain_ender_stee: Obtain a full set of Ender Steel Armor
tooltip.ender_steel.sword.void_strike: Void Strike: 50%% chance to teleport nearby enemies
tooltip.ender_steel.void_gaze_effect: Next hit blinds and immobilizes target
item.endersteel.ender_steel_sword.void_s: You hurt your enemy with the Void
message.void_mace.wrong_socket_type: Cannot add different socket type to an already socketed mace
